about.name: Sia Majid
about.bio: Full Stack Web Developer with a background in sociology and life-long dedication to learning. Excellence-driven Full Stack developer with versatile skill set and a strong passion for developing dynamic web applications. Bringing expertise in both front-end and back-end development, and thriving in dynamic, team-orientated settings. Embracing continues learning and approaching problem-solving with innovative thinking and effective communication.

projects.title: MatchMaker
projects.description: This Dating App is a comprehensive online dating platform that allows users to find their perfect match.Our dating app is a modern, user-friendly platform designed to help singles find love and connect with like-minded individuals. Tools: React, GraphQL, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Mongoose ODM, and Material UI

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: The Weather app is a highly efficient and user-friendly application that allows users to access detailed and accurate information about current and future weather forecasts in various cities. With its comprehensive features and intuitive interface, this app serves as an invaluable resource for individuals seeking up-to-date weather data for their desired locations. Tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, API, Local storage

projects.title: Hotels On Demand
projects.description: This application will help the user that is traveling find a hotel for their desired location. This application will also allow the user to see what the best food options are near that hotel.Tools: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bulma, Yelp Fusion API, and travel advisor API
